text: (Napiye!) Vanankalilum, pumiyilum ullavai anaittaiyum niccayamaka allah arikiran enpatai nir kavanikkavillaiya? Avarkalil munru perkal (kutip pecum) rakaciyattil avan nankavataka illamal illai. Aintu perkal (kutip pecum) irakaciyattil avan aravataka illamalillai. Itaivita kuraivakavo allatu atikamakavo ullavarkal (kutip pecum) irakaciyattilum, avan avarkalutan illamal illai. Ivvaru avarkal enkirunta potilum (rakaciyam pecinal avan avarkalutaiya rakaciyankalai arintu kolkiran). Pinnar, avarkal ceytavarraip parri avarkalukku marumai nalil arivi(ttu atarkuriya kuliyaik kotu)kkiran. Niccayamaka allah anaittaiyum nankarintavan avan
